confirmSignOut: Are you sure you want to log out?
manageUpdates: Manage how you receive updates from DocliQ. Settings are secured via DocliQ tokens.
appointmentReminders: Receive reminders for upcoming consultations and check-ins.
stayUpdated: Stay updated with DocliQ news and feature updates.
dataEncrypted: Your data is encrypted with DocliQ tokens.
allMedicalRecordsEncrypted: All medical records are stored with AES-256 encryption.
requestSecureCopy: Request a secure copy of your medical records.
controlAccess: Control access to camera, mic, and health sensors.
manageAccess: Manage which clinics and partners have access.
complianceText: DocliQ complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and German health data security standards. You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your data at any time.
resetAllDataWarning: This will permanently delete all your data and log you out.
resetAllDataConfirm: This will delete all your data and log you out. Are you sure?
supportChannels: Get help from our team. We typically respond within 24 hours.
urgentMedicalText: Please contact your local emergency services or visit the nearest hospital.
faqIntro: Common questions and answers about using DocliQ.
faq_question_1: How do I book an appointment?
faq_answer_1: You can book an appointment by navigating to the Home screen and tapping "Book Appointment". Follow the guided flow to select your specialty, location, doctor, and preferred time slot.
faq_question_2: Can I book appointments for family members?
faq_answer_2: Yes! You can add family members in Settings > Family Members. Once added, you can select them as the patient when booking an appointment.
faq_question_3: How do I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
faq_answer_3: Go to your appointment details from the Schedule tab. You'll find options to cancel or reschedule. Please note that some appointments may have cancellation policies.
faq_answer_4: Yes. All your medical records and personal data are encrypted with AES-256 encryption. We comply with GDPR and German health data security standards.
faq_question_5: How do I download my health records?
faq_answer_5: Go to Settings > Privacy & Data > Download Health Data. You can request a secure copy of your medical records which will be prepared and made available for download.
faq_answer_6: DocliQ supports both GKV (statutory health insurance) and PKV (private health insurance). You can set your insurance type in your profile settings.
helpTopic_gettingStarted_desc: Learn the basics of using DocliQ
offlineBanner: You are offline. Some actions may be unavailable.
